name: Mall IQ, Inc.
description: Developer of an indoor location-based engagement and analytics platform designed to provide actionable insights. The company's platform contains features like indoor location tracking, detailed analytics, effortless fast setup, and behavior-based campaign, enabling banks, credit unions, fintech, loyalty platforms, and retailers to digitize real-time purchase intent in the physical world.
one_liner: Developer of an indoor location-based engagement and analytics platform designed to provide actionable insights. The company's platform contains features like indoor location tracking, detailed analytics, effortless fast setup, and behavior-based campaign, enabling banks, credit unions, fintech, loyalty platforms, and retailers to digitize real-time purchase intent in the physical world.
